birth_place.zh-cn: 大清北京紫禁城景仁宫
birth_place.en: Jingren Palace, Forbidden City, Beijing, Great Qing

death_place.zh-cn: 大清北京畅春园清溪书屋
death_place.en: Qingxi Bookstore, Changchun Garden, Beijing, Great Qing

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝第四位皇帝，也是清军入关后的第二位皇帝，年号“康熙”。他在位六十一年零十个月，是中国历史上在位时间最长的皇帝。他在位期间，平定三藩、收复台湾、三征噶尔丹，并与俄国签订《尼布楚条约》，奠定了康雍乾盛世的基础。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty of China, and the second Qing emperor to rule over China proper. His reign of 61 years makes him the longest-reigning emperor in Chinese history. During his reign, he suppressed the Revolt of the Three Feudatories, conquered Taiwan, conducted three campaigns against Galdan, and signed the Treaty of Nerchinsk with Russia, laying the foundation for the High Qing era.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第三位皇帝，清朝入关后的首位皇帝，康熙帝之父。
description.en: The third emperor of the Qing dynasty, the first Qing emperor to rule over China proper, and the father of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，康熙帝第四子，是康乾盛世承上启下的关键人物。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor, and a key figure who bridged the Kangxi and Qianlong eras of the High Qing.

description.zh-cn: 顺治帝妃嫔，康熙帝的生母。
description.en: A consort of the Shunzhi Emperor and the biological mother of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清初权臣，康熙帝早年四位辅政大臣之一。后独揽大权，最终被康熙帝设计铲除。
description.en: A powerful Manchu official in the early Qing dynasty, one of the four regents for the young Kangxi Emperor. He later monopolized power and was eventually removed by Kangxi.

description.zh-cn: 清初重臣，康熙帝早年四位辅政大臣之首。
description.en: An influential Manchu official in the early Qing dynasty, the head of the four regents for the young Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清初重臣，康熙帝早年四位辅政大臣之一。
description.en: An influential Manchu official in the early Qing dynasty, one of the four regents for the young Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清初重臣，康熙帝早年四位辅政大臣之一，孝昭仁皇后之父。
description.en: An influential Manchu official in the early Qing dynasty, one of the four regents for the young Kangxi Emperor, and the father of Empress Xiaozhaoren.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙年间，由平西王吴三桂、平南王尚之信、靖南王耿精忠发动的反清叛乱。
description.en: An anti-Qing rebellion during the Kangxi era, launched by the three feudatories Wu Sangui, Shang Zhixin, and Geng Jingzhong.

description.zh-cn: 由郑成功在台湾建立的政权，奉南明为正朔，与清朝对峙，后被康熙帝派施琅攻灭。
description.en: A regime established in Taiwan by Koxinga, which remained loyal to the Southern Ming dynasty and resisted the Qing dynasty. It was later conquered by Kangxi's admiral Shi Lang.

description.zh-cn: 准噶尔汗国的大汗，曾多次与康熙帝统帅的清军交战，最终兵败自杀。
description.en: The Khan of the Zunghar Khanate who fought several wars against the Qing army led by the Kangxi Emperor, eventually committing suicide after being defeated.

description.zh-cn: 16世纪至18世纪的俄罗斯国家，在康熙年间与清朝发生边界冲突，后签订《尼布楚条约》。
description.en: The Russian state from the 16th to the 18th century, which had border conflicts with the Qing dynasty during the Kangxi era, leading to the signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk.

description.zh-cn: 清朝和俄罗斯沙皇国签订的第一份边界条约，确立了两国在黑龙江流域的边界。
description.en: The first border treaty signed between the Qing dynasty and the Tsardom of Russia, which established the border between the two empires in the Amur River basin.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪至18世纪由卫拉特蒙古准噶尔部建立的汗国，曾入侵西藏，后被清军驱逐。
description.en: A khanate established by the Zunghar tribe of the Oirat Mongols from the 17th to the 18th century. It once invaded Tibet and was later expelled by the Qing army.

en: Nine sons' fight for the throne

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝晚年，其众多皇子为争夺皇位而进行的政治斗争，对清朝政治产生了不良影响。
description.en: A political struggle among the Kangxi Emperor's numerous sons for the succession to the throne in his later years, which had a negative impact on Qing politics.

description.zh-cn: 德国耶稣会传教士，曾建议顺治帝立得过天花的玄烨为太子。在康熙初年因历狱案被判刑，后被平反。
description.en: A German Jesuit missionary who suggested to the Shunzhi Emperor to appoint Xuan Ye, who had survived smallpox, as the crown prince. He was sentenced during the Calendar Case in the early Kangxi era but was later exonerated.

description.zh-cn: 清初官员，反对西洋学说，勾结鳌拜制造康熙历狱，陷害汤若望等人。
description.en: An official in the early Qing dynasty who opposed Western learning. He colluded with Oboi to create the Calendar Case, framing Johann Adam Schall von Bell and others.

description.zh-cn: 清康熙初年，杨光先等人攻击西洋历法，导致汤若望等传教士和中国官员被判刑的事件。
description.en: An incident in the early Kangxi era where Yang Guangxian and others attacked the Western calendar, leading to the sentencing of missionaries like Johann Adam Schall von Bell and Chinese officials.

description.zh-cn: 比利时耶稣会传教士，在康熙朝任职，向康熙帝传授西方科学知识，并负责监造火炮。
description.en: A Flemish Jesuit missionary who served in the Kangxi court, taught Western scientific knowledge to the emperor, and supervised the production of cannons.

description.zh-cn: 明末清初将领，后受封平西王。康熙年间因撤藩而起兵反清，发动三藩之乱。
description.en: A general at the end of the Ming and beginning of the Qing dynasties, later enfeoffed as the Prince of Pacifying the West. During the Kangxi era, he rebelled against the Qing over the decision to abolish the feudatories, starting the Revolt of the Three Feudatories.

description.zh-cn: 清太宗皇太极之妃，顺治帝生母，康熙帝祖母。在清初政治中扮演重要角色，曾支持康熙帝平定三藩之乱。
description.en: A consort of Hong Taiji, the mother of the Shunzhi Emperor, and the grandmother of the Kangxi Emperor. She played a significant role in early Qing politics and supported Kangxi during the Revolt of the Three Feudatories.

description.zh-cn: 清朝将领，原为明郑将领，后降清。康熙年间任福建水师提督，率军攻克台湾，消灭明郑政权。
description.en: A Qing dynasty admiral, originally a general for the Kingdom of Tungning before defecting to the Qing. During the Kangxi era, he served as the admiral of the Fujian fleet and led the forces that conquered Taiwan, eliminating the Tungning regime.

description.zh-cn: 明郑末代君主，在施琅大军压境下降清。
description.en: The last ruler of the Kingdom of Tungning, who surrendered to the Qing forces led by Shi Lang.

description.zh-cn: 清代火器专家，曾发明“连珠火铳”。后因遭南怀仁诬陷而被康熙帝流放。
description.en: A firearms expert in the Qing dynasty who invented a repeating firearm. He was later framed by Ferdinand Verbiest and exiled by the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 由孔子创立的、源远流长的思想体系。康熙帝崇尚儒学，特别是程朱理学，并以此笼络汉人士大夫。
description.en: A long-standing system of thought founded by Confucius. The Kangxi Emperor revered Confucianism, especially the Cheng-Zhu school of Neo-Confucianism, and used it to win the support of Han Chinese scholar-officials.

description.zh-cn: 康熙晚年的一起文字狱，因戴名世的《南山集》而起。康熙利用此案来抑制汉人士大夫的反叛思想。
description.en: A literary inquisition case during the late Kangxi era, centered around Dai Mingshi's work 'Nanshan Ji'. The Kangxi Emperor used this case to suppress rebellious thoughts among Han Chinese scholar-officials.

description.zh-cn: 清代文学家，因其著作《南山集》中使用了南明纪年而卷入“南山案”文字狱，最终被处斩。
description.en: A Qing dynasty writer who was implicated in the 'Nanshan Case' literary inquisition for using Southern Ming era names in his work 'Nanshan Ji', and was ultimately executed.

description.zh-cn: 由康熙帝委任中外学者，运用西方测绘技术绘制的全国地图，是当时世界上地理学的最高成就之一。
description.en: A comprehensive map of China commissioned by the Kangxi Emperor, created by Chinese and foreign scholars using Western surveying techniques. It was one of the highest achievements in world geography at the time.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝嫡次子，孝诚仁皇后所生。曾两度被立为皇太子，后被废黜。
description.en: The second son and heir apparent of the Kangxi Emperor, born to Empress Xiaochengren. He was twice appointed as Crown Prince and later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝的第一任皇后，辅政大臣索尼的孙女。在生下皇太子胤礽时因难产驾崩。
description.en: The first empress consort of the Kangxi Emperor, granddaughter of the regent Sony. She died from complications of childbirth after giving birth to the Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第二位君主，努尔哈赤第八子，顺治帝之父，康熙帝之祖父。
description.en: The second ruler of the Qing dynasty, the eighth son of Nurhaci, father of the Shunzhi Emperor, and grandfather of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝，由满族建立。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, established by the Manchu people.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝是顺治帝的第三子。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor was the third son of the Shunzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝的生母是孝康章皇后佟佳氏。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor's biological mother was Empress Xiaokangzhang of the Tonggiya clan.

description.zh-cn: 顺治帝临终时遗诏立玄烨为皇太子。
description.en: On his deathbed, the Shunzhi Emperor's will designated Xuan Ye as the Crown Prince.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝是康熙帝的第四子。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor was the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝遗诏由皇四子胤禛继承皇位。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor's will decreed that his fourth son, Yinzhen, would inherit the throne.

description.zh-cn: 作为辅政大臣，鳌拜独揽大权，使年幼的康熙帝无法亲政。
description.en: As a regent, Oboi monopolized power, preventing the young Kangxi Emperor from exercising personal rule.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝发动突袭，逮捕并囚禁了鳌拜，扫除了亲政障碍。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor launched a surprise operation to arrest and imprison Oboi, removing the main obstacle to his personal rule.

description.zh-cn: 索尼是顺治帝指定的四位辅政大臣之首，辅佐年幼的康熙帝。
description.en: Sony was the head of the four regents appointed by the Shunzhi Emperor to assist the young Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝在孝庄太后的支持下，积极调兵遣将，最终完全扑灭了三藩之乱。
description.en: With the support of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang, the Kangxi Emperor actively dispatched troops and eventually completely suppressed the Revolt of the Three Feudatories.

description.zh-cn: 因康熙帝决定削藩，平西王吴三桂起兵反清，发动了三藩之乱。
description.en: In response to the Kangxi Emperor's decision to abolish the feudatories, Wu Sangui, the Prince of Pacifying the West, rebelled against the Qing, starting the Revolt of the Three Feudatories.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝派遣施琅为福建水师提督，率军攻克台湾，消灭了明郑政权。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor dispatched Shi Lang as the admiral of the Fujian fleet, who led forces to conquer Taiwan and eliminate the Kingdom of Tungning.

description.zh-cn: 施琅受康熙帝任命，负责平定台湾。
description.en: Shi Lang was appointed by the Kangxi Emperor to be in charge of conquering Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝曾三次亲征，多次击败准噶尔汗国首领噶尔丹。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor personally led three campaigns and repeatedly defeated Galdan, the leader of the Zunghar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与俄罗斯沙皇国签订了《尼布楚条约》，这是两国间的第一个边界条约。
description.en: The Qing dynasty and the Tsardom of Russia signed the Treaty of Nerchinsk, which was the first border treaty between the two countries.

description.zh-cn: 《尼布楚条约》的签订确保了清朝对黑龙江流域和广大东北地区的控制。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk secured the Qing dynasty's control over the Amur River basin and the vast northeastern region.

description.zh-cn: 汤若望建议顺治帝立曾得过天花并幸存的玄烨为皇太子，推动了其继位。
description.en: Johann Adam Schall von Bell suggested to the Shunzhi Emperor that he appoint Xuan Ye, who had survived smallpox, as the crown prince, thereby promoting his succession.

description.zh-cn: 杨光先勾结鳌拜，捏词陷害汤若望，导致其在康熙历狱中被判处死刑。
description.en: Yang Guangxian colluded with Oboi to frame Johann Adam Schall von Bell with false accusations, leading to his death sentence during the Kangxi Calendar Case.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝亲政后为汤若望平反，恢复其名誉。
description.en: After assuming personal rule, the Kangxi Emperor exonerated Johann Adam Schall von Bell and restored his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 杨光先依附鳌拜，共同反对西洋学说并制造康熙历狱。
description.en: Yang Guangxian aligned with Oboi to oppose Western learning and orchestrate the Kangxi Calendar Case.

description.zh-cn: 南怀仁向康熙帝传授代数、几何、天文等西方科学知识，并帮助其督造火炮。
description.en: Ferdinand Verbiest taught the Kangxi Emperor Western scientific knowledge such as algebra, geometry, and astronomy, and helped him supervise the production of cannons.

description.zh-cn: 因南怀仁诬陷戴梓“私通东洋”，康熙帝将其流放到盛京。
description.en: Due to Ferdinand Verbiest's false accusation that Dai Zi was 'privately communicating with Japan', the Kangxi Emperor exiled him to Shengjing.

description.zh-cn: 南怀仁因嫉妒戴梓在火器制造方面的才能，诬陷其“私通东洋”。
description.en: Ferdinand Verbiest, jealous of Dai Zi's talent in firearms manufacturing, falsely accused him of 'privately communicating with Japan'.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝崇尚儒学，举办博学鸿儒科，亲临曲阜拜谒孔庙，以笼络汉人士大夫。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor promoted Confucianism, held special examinations for scholars, and personally visited the Temple of Confucius in Qufu to win over Han Chinese scholar-officials.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝委任中外学者，运用当时最先进的测绘技术在全国大规模实地测量，绘制成《康熙皇舆全览图》。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor commissioned Chinese and foreign scholars to conduct large-scale field surveys across the country using the most advanced surveying techniques of the time, resulting in the creation of the Kangxi Imperial Atlas.

description.zh-cn: 戴名世因其著作《南山集》中的内容被卷入“南山案”文字狱，最终被处斩。
description.en: Dai Mingshi was implicated in the 'Nanshan Case' literary inquisition due to the content of his work 'Nanshan Ji', and was ultimately executed.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝曾两度册立允礽为皇太子，但最终都将其废黜。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor twice installed Yunreng as Crown Prince, but ultimately deposed him both times.

description.zh-cn: 允礽是康熙帝嫡后孝诚仁皇后所生。
description.en: Yunreng was born to Empress Xiaochengren, the Kangxi Emperor's first empress consort.

description.zh-cn: 康熙废太子事件造成的夺嫡之争对清朝政治产生了不良影响。
description.en: The struggle for succession caused by the Kangxi Emperor's deposition of the crown prince had a negative impact on Qing politics.

description.zh-cn: 鳌拜曾在战场上救过康熙帝的祖父皇太极的性命。
description.en: Oboi once saved the life of the Kangxi Emperor's grandfather, Hong Taiji, on the battlefield.
